definition: A term commonly employed to describe the absence or deprivation of something valuable, often resulting in a negative emotional impact. It is frequently used to refer to the act or state of losing, whether it be a person, possession, opportunity, or abstract concept.

examples.german: Der Verlust meines Schlüssels hat mich sehr geärgert.
examples.english: Losing my key really annoyed me.

examples.german: Der Verlust des Spiels war enttäuschend.
examples.english: The loss of the game was disappointing.

examples.german: Der Verlust an Lebensqualität war enorm.
examples.english: The loss of quality of life was enormous.

examples.german: Der Verlust des Arbeitsplatzes war ein harter Schlag.
examples.english: Losing the job was a hard blow.

examples.german: Der Verlust der Freiheit ist unerträglich.
examples.english: The loss of freedom is unbearable.
